messages.subject: R: [samuraihistory] Book Sale
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tom. Interested but unable to contact you at junkmail@toryu-mon.com. Carlo tsubame1@tin.it ... Da: Tom Helm [mailto:junkmail@toryu-mon.com] Inviato:
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tom. Interested but unable to contact you at junkmail@....
Carlo tsubame1@...


-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: Tom Helm [mailto:junkmail@...]
Inviato: marted√¨ 8 marzo 2005 6.24
A: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Oggetto: [samuraihistory] Book Sale


Apologies for crass commercialism;

All,
I am clearing out some shelf space to make room for yet more
books.
Please help me provide a good home for my old books. There is something
for everyone Japanese Art, history, Martial arts, Nihonto, tsuba and
kodogu. There is something in every language as well so if you read
French, German, Italian, Dutch, Czech, Japanese or even English you'll
find something you like here. Please email me OFF LIST if you are
interested in seeing the list of titles.
thanks,
Tom
